Question.Subject: To everyone out there with a deviantart, and all of you without?
Question.Content: I was wondering if any of you would like to comment on my picture(s) or just view them. I'm so lonely! http://itsmichellezo.deviantart.com/art/Pink-in-Gray-156224225 If you post your links, I'll take a look! Thanks guys. Tell me what you think. In DA comment?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
i have a DA. Though, i more of comment then post...except when im bored really... here's my link:
